hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: instance
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: all: deploys all CI instances ci.suse.de: deploys all CI jobs on ci.suse.de ci.opensuse.org: deploys all CI jobs on ci.opensuse.org

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
## THIS JOB ONLY UPDATES JENKINS JOBS - NO WORKER CODE IN HERE - DO NOT DARE TO ADD SOME ## THUS RUNNING ON THE DEDICATED TRIGGER NODE [[ $NODE_NAME != 'cloud-trigger' ]] && exit 99 ##
set -x
export automationrepo=~/github.com/SUSE-Cloud/automation
# automation bootstrapping if ! [ -e ${automationrepo}/scripts/jenkins/update_automation ] ; then rm -rf ${automationrepo} curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SUSE-Cloud/automation/master/scripts/jenkins/update_automation | bash fi # fetch the latest automation updates ${automationrepo}/scripts/jenkins/update_automation
targets=jjb_test # secure fallback case $instance in all) targets="cisd_deploy cioo_deploy" ;; ci.suse.de) targets=cisd_deploy ;; ci.opensuse.org) targets=cioo_deploy ;; esac
cd ${automationrepo} make jjb_test for one_target in $targets ; do make $one_target done
